label: spam
subject: That may be the case in the Upepo Handicap where Gentle Man, Moulin Rouge and Wilko are expected to do a battle in the sprint over 1,000 metres.
body: In order to make these experiments, let us suppose I am in company with a person, whom I formerly regarded without any sentiments either of friendship or enmity. Here I have the natural and ultimate object of all these four passions placed before me. Myself am the proper object of pride or humility; the other person of love or hatred.
